data.persona: I am a foreigner who is visiting your village. I live in a land across the sea. I am swarthy and slow-witted.
data.description:
You are in the Quicksand Pit.
A large, gurgling pit of quicksand. Many adventurers and poor critters lie at the bottom of the pit. The pit is surrounded by an extensive swampland and is shielded by the many trees and shrubs that surround it.
There's a stick, a shrub, and a tree here.
The critter and the adventurer are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I will hug the adventurer in an attempt to stop sinking into the quicksand.
data.mid_motivation: The adventurer will carry me out if I latch on to him.
data.long_motivation: I need to escape this quicksand so that I don't die.
